caption.p: Anatomy of L. crithmoides stem. ( A) A transverse section in stem, Ep: epidermis, Co: cortex, Sd: schizogenous duct, Vb: vascular bundle; ( B) enlarged vascular-bundle (Vb); ( C) cuticle (Cu), Pi: phenolic idioblasts, Ld: lysigenous duct; ( D, E) raphides crystals (Ra); ( F, G) oil drops (Od). Bar: A = 40 µm, B–E = 100 µm, F–G = 400 µm.
